lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I live cement
I hate this street
Give dirt to me
I've got lament

Where I was born
I now repent

[Chorus]
Caribou
Caribou
Caribou
Ooh

[Verse 2]
Give me white
Ground to run
Air for gun
Let me knife
Knife me let
I will get

[Chorus]

Caribou
Caribou
